App Name: Origami Paper SnipSnap
App Package Name: com.monois.android.eduapp26

Brief

Unveil your creativity without the need for actual paper with Origami Paper SnipSnap, a digital paper cutting and origami experience unlike any other. Engage in a unique blend of crafting and fun to imagine and give life to countless shapes, save your favorites, and recreate them anytime.
